thread.section_title: ZipRecruiter Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ZipRecruiter | ziprecruiter.com | 3 of 178
thread.title: Becky Howard

author: Becky Howard
title: Becky Howard
text:
I called in with a troubleshooting question and Maxcine walked me through a few steps and had me fixed quickly! She then offered some quick advice on the format of our postings that would make it more efficient to attract candidates. I asked a few more questions and she shared a feature on ZipRecruiter that I was unfamiliar with- the Interview Questions on screening applicants! Wow! I was amazed and really appreciated her help!
Thanks Max!
